Dutch                        _O

Reggie                       _O     
Blinker                      _O

by                           _O

on                           _O     
Friday                       _O

to                           _O

against                      _O

on                           _O     
Saturday                     _O     
.                            _O     
Blinker                      _O     
missed                       _O     
his                          _O     
club                         _O     
's                           _O     
last                         _O     
two                          _O     
games                        _O     
after                        _O     
FIFA                         _O     
slapped                      _O     
a                            _O

on                           _O     
him                          _O     
for                          _O

's                           _O     
players                      _O

status                       _O

,                            _O

was                          _O

valid                        _O     
,                            _O     
it                           _O     
could                        _O     
not                          _O

.                            _O

committee                    _O     
said                         _O

club                         _O     
had                          _O

pounds                       _O     
(                            _O

7,400                        _O

on                           _O     
Friday                       _O     
for                          _O     
hurling                      _O

at                           _O     
restaurant                   _O     
staff                        _O

a                            _O

restaurant                   _O

was                          _O

in                           _O

by                           _O     
security                     _O

of                           _O

in                           _O

in                           _O     
an                           _O     
east                         _O

in                           _O

.                            _O

had                          _O     
already                      _O

Bowyer                       _O     
4,000                        _O     
pounds                       _O

on                           _O     
imports                      _O

gasoline                     _O     
and                          _O     
gasoil                       _O     
products                     _O

January                      _O     
1                            _O     
,                            _O     
1996                         _O     
,                            _O     
saying                       _O

contravened                  _O     
levels                       _O

in                           _O

Europe                       _O

between                      _O     
the                          _O     
EU                           _O     
and                          _O     
Poland                       _O     
.                            _O

increases                    _O

Polish                       _O     
market                       _O

local                        _O     
oil                          _O     
industry                     _O     
.                            _O     
"                            _O

EU                           _O     
and                          _O     
Poland                       _O

now                          _O     
reached                      _O

all                          _O

on                           _O

-                            _O

in                           _O     
hosting                      _O     
WTO                          _O     
.                            _O     
Ramthan                      _O     
Hussain                      _O     
SINGAPORE                    _O     
1996-12-06                   _O     
Singapore                    _O     
's                           _O     
winning                      _O     
campaign                     _O     
to                           _O     
host                         _O     
the                          _O     
World                        _O     
Trade                        _O     
Organisation                 _O     
(                            _O     
WTO                          _O     
)                            _O     
's                           _O     
first                        _O     
ministerial                  _O     
meeting                      _O     
reflected                    _O     
its                          _O     
ambition                     _O     
to                           _O     
play                         _O     
a                            _O     
key                          _O     
role                         _O     
in                           _O     
shaping                      _O     
global                       _O     
free                         _O     
trade                        _O     
,                            _O     
the                          _O     
lifeblood                    _O     
of                           _O     
its                          _O     
economy                      _O     
,                            _O     
analysts                     _O     
said                         _O     
.                            _O     
"                            _O     
As                           _O     
one                          _O     
of                           _O     
the                          _O     
world                        _O     
's                           _O     
most                         _O     
externally                   _O     
oriented                     _O     
economies                    _O     
,                            _O     
Singapore                    _O     
has                          _O     
a                            _O     
disproportionately           _O     
large                        _O     
stake                        _O     
in                           _O     
the                          _O

ROUND                        _O     
OF                           _O

WASHED                       _O     
OUT                          _O     
.                            _O     
TARPON                       _O     
SPRINGS                      _O     
,                            _O     
Florida                      _O     
1996-12-07                   _O

rains                        _O     
on                           _O     
Saturday                     _O     
washed                       _O     
out                          _O     
the                          _O     
third                        _O     
round                        _O     
of                           _O     
the                          _O     
$                            _O     
1.5                          _O     
million                      _O     
JCPenney                     _O     
Classic                      _O     
at                           _O     
the                          _O     
Innisbrook                   _O     
Hilton                       _O     
Resort                       _O     
.                            _O     
Officials                    _O     
said                         _O     
the                          _O     
tournament                   _O     
would                        _O     
be                           _O     
reduced                      _O     
to                           _O     
54                           _O     
holes                        _O     
for                          _O     
the                          _O     
first                        _O     
time                         _O     
in                           _O     
its                          _O     
37-year                      _O     
history                      _O     
.                            _O

final                        _O     
round                        _O     
of                           _O     
the                          _O     
special                      _O     
event                        _O

which                        _O

and                          _O     
LPGA                         _O

shot                         _O     
format                       _O     
on                           _O     
Sunday                       _O

shot                         _O     
into                         _O     
the                          _O

Charlton                     _O
